name: Ice Maker
description:
Joyful jingling seasons!

Make a snowflake, and send it to a friend!

Send to a friend:

  • EDIT your snowflake as much as you like
  • Click the SHARE button, and add your special message in the box
  • Copy the link that is created in the rightmost box
  • Send the link via twitter or mail or your favorite social network!

Not working for you? Try opening it in Chrome or Firefox, you will have better luck.
